posts.title: So many chances so many missed connections - missed connections
posts.body: It seems only logical to post here in missed  connections...I never look I never hold any glances or notice any one noticing me...I'm so lonely and have reached my absolute end I just dont think I can take another night of silence and television. I'm an introvert so it's extremely hard for me to talk to people in person on my own steam until approached first..I didnt used to be this person..i want to have fun again..I need someone to talk to, to love, to know me in this life..I cant be left alone with my own thoughts for another week...I'm slowly dying inside..

posts.title: Titusville YMCA guy - missed connections
posts.body: I helped you out a couple of times at the old Y. You even stopped by my house once for some help. Just wondering if you're in need of any help?

posts.title: Chap train station to Bloomingdales - missed connections
posts.body: How did we get here. A perfect thing ruined and vanished right before my eyes... You gave up, you stopped caring and loving ...All I ever wanted was to make you happy.If you love something, love it completely, cherish it, say it, but most importantly show it.Life is finite and fragile, and just because something is there one day, it might not be there the next. Never take that for granted.
